sentences.en: a picturesque description of life at sea
sentences.cn: 对海上生活生动的描述

sentences.en: Berlin sounds fascinating from your description.
sentences.cn: 从你的描述来看，柏林是个迷人的城市。

sentences.en: boats of every description /all descriptions
sentences.cn: 各种类型的船

sentences.en: Could you just give us a description of your cat?
sentences.cn: 能否请您向我们描述一下您的猫？

sentences.en: Doctors can get the wrong impression from even an accurate description.
sentences.cn: 即便很精确的病历也可能让医生产生错误的印象。

sentences.en: Events of this description occurred daily.
sentences.cn: 这类事件天天发生。

sentences.en: Her description of the nature and action of poisons is amazingly accurate.
sentences.cn: 他对一些毒药的性质和作用的描述惊人地准确。

sentences.en: His courage beggars description.
sentences.cn: 他的胆量无法用语言来形容。

sentences.en: His description fits perfectly the evidence dug up by Clyde.
sentences.cn: 他的描述和克莱德发现的证据正好吻合。

sentences.en: his face was swollen beyond description.
sentences.cn: 他的脸肿得无法形容。

sentences.en: Plainly, a more objective method of description must be adopted.
sentences.cn: 显而易见，必须采用更为客观的描述方法。

sentences.en: She gave an exact description of the attacker.
sentences.cn: 她对袭击者的特征作了精确的描述。

sentences.en: The book ends on a lengthy description of Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 这本书以对夏威夷的冗长描述为结尾。

sentences.en: The booklet gives a brief description of each place.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子对每一个地方都作了简短的介绍。

sentences.en: The description fits us to a tee.
sentences.cn: 这样的描述再适合我们不过了。

sentences.en: The description was pretty vague.
sentences.cn: 描述相当模糊。

sentences.en: the sheer scale of the Requiem defies description.
sentences.cn: 安魂弥撒的规模大得无法形容。

sentences.en: This description didn't seem to tally with what we saw.
sentences.cn: 这一描述似乎与我们目睹的情况不符。

sentences.en: Two men answer-ing the description of the suspects tried to enter Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 与描述的疑犯样子相符的两名男子试图进入瑞士。

sentences.en: We were in a disaster situation that defies description.
sentences.cn: 我们陷入了难以言表的糟糕处境。
